author: civanch
body:
This PR is made instead of #21767 and #21797 
Geant4 calorimeter sensitive detectors are updated:
1) use const G4Step* pointer in protected and private interfaces where possible
2) Two main methods for sub-detectors : getFromLibrary(..) amd getEnergyDeposit(.. )
3) use std::unique_ptr and other C++11 features in several places
4) optimized ECalSD run time methods - perform one search over map of logical volumes instead of 3
use const pointers and references
5) removed duplicate codes 
6) optimised LogInfo and LogDebug - verbose output is substantially smaller but more informative
7) removed old commented lines
8) applied corrections suggested by @kpedro88 and @VinInn 

Correctness of this PR means identical results for all WFs.
title: Geant4 sensitive detectors update 3
